text: The men's 10,000 metres event at the 1999 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Göteborg, Sweden, at Ullevi on 29 July 1999. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Marco Mazza ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Janne Holmén ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Ovidiu Tat ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 29 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
